message:
South: Loneford
East: Brimhaven
West: Moeston (currently closed)
[You also see something else written on the arrow pointing to the west, but you cannot understand the words]
Ack, if it wasn't for those things out there, I am sure a lot of people would come by here more often. Apart from a few Remgard traders lately, I haven't seen anyone in weeks.

replies.text: Would you like me to kill the creatures for you?
